#summary SSA4J Annotation Reference
#labels Featured

|| *Annotation* || *Description* ||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSession @ScrapeSession] || This is the top level annotation for any Class that will bind to a scrape session. ||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSessionErrors @ScrapeSessionErrors || This annotation enables the caller program to map session variables as error messages scraped from the page. ||
